import React from 'react' /* component that renders a set of 5 colored stars that correspond to the input value prop and count of reviews*/ function Rating({ value, text, color }) { return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' // full star : value >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' // half star : 'far fa-star' // empty star }> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' // full star : value >= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' // half star : 'far fa-star' // empty star }> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' // full star : value >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' // half star : 'far fa-star' // empty star }> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' // full star : value >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' // half star : 'far fa-star' // empty star }> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' // full star : value >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' // half star : 'far fa-star' // empty star }> {text && text}
) } export default Rating
